text:
Aww yeah! Today we're learning English with 
The Ellen Show. One of the best ways to learn

English is by doing something that makes you 
laugh. That's why today we're learning English

with Ellen DeGeneres and one of her fans who 
actually learned English by watching her show.

Before we get into the lesson, we want to 
let you know that every week we make lessons

just like this one, to help you learn English 
without getting lost, without missing the jokes

and without subtitles. Just like Rafael, who says 
that he learned so much more with our channel than

months of classroom learning. So don't forget to 
hit that Subscribe button and the Bell down below,

so that you don't miss any of our new lessons! 
Now let's learn English with the Ellen show.

This lesson is even more proof that 
you can learn English in a fun way,

by watching your favorite TV programs or 
movies. So I highly recommend a Fluent with

Friends course. In this 48-week course you 
will learn in a fun way with the first two

seasons of Friends. Every week you'll receive PDF 
power lessons. vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle Global Community 
and so much more! And did you know that you can

try it right now for FREE with our 3-Part 
Masterclass! All you have to do is click

here or in the description box below to learn 
more and sign up now. We hope to see you there!

Do you want to learn more vocabulary and 
pronunciation whilst laughing? Then why

not check out our lesson with Julia 
Roberts and Ellen's. You can click

here or in the description box below 
to watch it straight after this lesson.
